sourceMeaningMnemonic: On the <radical>insect</radical> <radical>signpost</radical> there is a single sign that says <kanji>bee</kanji>.
meaningInfo: This particular insect signpost points you to where the bee is.
readingMnemonic: Thanks to the insect signpost you find the <kanji>bee</kanji>. You make it just in time to see the bee <reading>hatch</reading> (<ja>はち</ja>) from its egg.
readingInfo: You got to see a single bee hatch! What a beautiful sight. Weird that a signpost points to it.
